00051 namespace {
00052 
00053   struct MyPolicy : Config::Policy {
00054     static void init_options() {
00055       alias("port", "Hypertable.Master.Port");
00056       alias("workers", "Hypertable.Master.Workers");
00057       alias("reactors", "Hypertable.Master.Reactors");
00058     }
00059   };
00060 
00061   typedef Meta::list<MyPolicy, GenericServerPolicy, DfsClientPolicy,
00062           HyperspaceClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00063 
00064   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00065   public:
00066     HandlerFactory(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue,
00067                    MasterPtr &master_ptr)
00068       : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_master_ptr(master_ptr) { }
00069 
00070     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00071       dhp = new ConnectionHandler(m_comm, m_app_queue_ptr, m_master_ptr);
00072     }
00073 
00074   private:
00075     Comm                *m_comm;
00076     ApplicationQueuePtr  m_app_queue_ptr;
00077     MasterPtr            m_master_ptr;
00078   };
00079 
00080 } // local namespace
00081 
00082 
00083 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00084   try {
00085     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00086 
00087     uint16_t port = get_i16("port");
00088     int worker_count  = get_i32("workers");
00089 
00090     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00091     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00092     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00093     MasterPtr master = new Master(properties, conn_mgr, app_queue);
00094     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr hf(new HandlerFactory(comm, app_queue, master));
00095     InetAddr listen_addr(INADDR_ANY, port);
00096 
00097     comm->listen(listen_addr, hf);
00098 
00099     master->join();
00100     comm->close_socket(listen_addr);
00101   }
00102   catch (Exception &e) {
00103     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00104     return 1;
00105   }
00106   return 0;
00107 }
